dole.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: money given by the government in Britain to people who are unemployed
dole.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Too many young people are still on the dole.
The number claiming dole went up by 3,500.
dole.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: in Britain, money that the government gives to people who are looking for work
dole.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: A whole generation of miners ended up on the dole.
unemployed demonstrators protesting at dole cuts
